description: Defines available placeholders for event communication templates. Each placeholder represents a variable detail that changes per event instance. Backend services can use this to generate form fields for placeholder values.

placeholders.label: Service name
placeholders.description: The affected service, API, or product component

placeholders.label: Feature
placeholders.description: The specific feature, page, or module affected

placeholders.label: Date
placeholders.description: A specific date (e.g. maintenance date, resolution date)

placeholders.label: Start time
placeholders.description: Start of a maintenance or downtime window

placeholders.label: End time
placeholders.description: End of a maintenance or downtime window

placeholders.label: Timespan
placeholders.description: Duration or time range of the event

placeholders.label: Deadline
placeholders.description: Deadline by which users must complete an action

placeholders.label: URL
placeholders.description: A link users need to visit (e.g. new endpoint, documentation)

placeholders.label: API endpoint
placeholders.description: The specific API endpoint or route affected

placeholders.label: Version
placeholders.description: A version number (e.g. old version, new version)

placeholders.label: Error message
placeholders.description: The error text that users see

placeholders.label: Size limit
placeholders.description: A file size, rate limit, or threshold value

placeholders.label: Workaround
placeholders.description: A temporary workaround or alternative approach

placeholders.label: Affected region
placeholders.description: Geographic region or data center affected

placeholders.label: Contact
placeholders.description: Contact information for support or escalation
